summary: One by one, with a sweet but inexorable rate, Ugo's colleagues, go to a better life. When Ugo is attending at one of the innumerable funerals, he and the priest remain involved in an ... See full summary Â»
cast: Paolo Villaggio|Milena Vukotic|Anna Mazzamauro|Gigi Reder|Plinio Fernando|Jimmy il Fenomeno|Stefano Antonucci|Stefania Bellucci|Angelo Bernabucci|Marna Del Monaco|Emanuele Magnoni|Giulio Massimini|Paolo Paoloni|Vito Passeri|Antonio Protano|Gloria Scotti|Giuseppe Terranova|Paolo Buglioni
title: Fantozzi in paradiso
